definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: A dual-channel night vision color image fusion system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种双通道夜视图像的彩色融合系统。

sentences.english: Phoebe: Look, he gave me his night vision goggles and everything.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的夜视镜和一切东西都交给我了。

sentences.english: The sensors work in combination with night-camera technology.
sentences.chinese: 其传感器与夜视摄像技术相结合共同工作。

sentences.english: That's because he is armed with the latest night-vision equiment.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为他装备了最先进的夜视设备。

sentences.english: New technology could make night vision more widely available.
sentences.chinese: 新技术让夜视功能的应用范围更加广泛。

sentences.english: Cockpits are night vision goggle compatible.
The Infrared image enhancement is of great importance in the area of night vision technology.
sentences.chinese: 红外图像增强技术是夜视技术领域一项重要内容。

sentences.english: At the same time, the LLL night vision device has also other active and passive interferences.
sentences.chinese: 同时，微光夜视还受到其它有源和无源干扰。

sentences.english: With the development of night vision technology, it is applied more widely.
sentences.chinese: 随着微光夜视技术的发展，其应用越来越广泛。

sentences.english: The night vision binocular to be used for lookout in night time.
sentences.chinese: 夜视望远镜可用于晚上瞭望。

sentences.english: The green lenis popular with pilots to preserve night vision.
sentences.chinese: 绿色色片普遍提供飞行人员眼睛保有夜视的能力。

sentences.english: The videocam can be replaced with a night vision system and laser sights.
sentences.chinese: 摄像头可以用夜视系统和激光瞄准系统取代。

sentences.english: Carl Vandenberge, two of Battle Company’s biggest. And they had stolen night vision goggles and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他们也偷来了敌人的夜视镜和机关枪。

sentences.english: Close to the country Taibai night vision light, die without a battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 夜视太白收光芒，报国欲死无战场。

sentences.english: It helps develop balance and night vision.
sentences.chinese: 那有助于提高平衡和夜视。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a screw driver which can realize night viewing and has a plurality of other functions.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种能够夜视且具有其它多种功能的改锥。

definition: ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
